steps.gmResponse:
You move north.

Dark Corridor
-------------
narrow stone passage. echoing footsteps. dripping water sounds. spider webs in corners. worn flagstone floor.

Exits: south (Dungeon Entrance), east (Ancient Treasury), west (Forgotten Armory), north (Abandoned Throne Room)

You see:
  - Giant Rat (neutral)
  - Giant Rat (neutral)
  - Suspicious Loose Stone

steps.gmResponse:
You move north.

Abandoned Throne Room
---------------------
massive stone throne. faded royal tapestries. cracked marble floor. ominous shadows. cold draft from unseen passages. skeleton slumped on throne.

Exits: south (Dark Corridor), north (Hidden Chamber)

You see:
  - Skeleton King (neutral)
